title: [The Rift, Scatter]
description: Eyes of various shapes and sizes peer out from the soft pink ceiling above, blinking and following every movement within the room.  Hands from different beasts and humanoids protrude from the walls, grasping for anything within reach.  The floor is covered with ice water and dark swimming shapes, with only a few slightly raised stones providing safe passage from one end to the other.

Eyes of various shapes and sizes peer out from the soft pink ceiling above, blinking and following every movement within the room.  Hands from different beasts and humanoids protrude from the walls, grasping for anything within reach.  The floor is composed of molten rock, with only a few slightly raised stones providing safe passage from one end to the other.
